Key Match Events: The Vietnamese team lost to Indonesia 0-1 in the second match of the group stage of the Asian Cup 2023.
Post-Match Reflections: The Vietnamese team was eliminated early from the 2023 Asian Cup after losing to Indonesia.
Coach Philippe Troussier and his team are definitely at the bottom of the group, no matter what the final match result is.
If the Vietnamese team won against Iraq, they could not rise to third place due to head-to-head performance rules.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Vietnamese team played poorly in the first half and conceded a penalty.
Nguyen Quang Hai scored the only goal to help Vietnam win against Indonesia in the previous match.
The Vietnamese team's last victory against Indonesia was in the AFF Cup semi-final 2016.
